verses.verse: <S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H3847>Clothe<s%> <S%H3847>yourself<s%> in your <S%H5797>strength,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> <S%H3847>Clothe<s%> <S%H3847>yourself<s%> in your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%> For the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> Will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into you.

<S%H5287>Shake<s%> yourself from the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up, O <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H6605>Loose<s%> yourself from the <S%H4147>chains<s%> around your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> O <S%H9577>captive<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "You were <S%H4376>sold<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing<s%> and you will be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3701>money.<s%>"

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>reside<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> then the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> them <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H657>cause.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H4100>what<s%> do I have <S%H6311>here,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "seeing that My <S%H5971>people<s%> have been <S%H3947>taken<s%> away <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%>?" [Again] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>declares,<s%> "Those who <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them <S%H3213>howl,<s%> and My <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5006>blasphemed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> My <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> I am the one who is <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> <S%H2009>'Here<s%> I am.'"

<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H4998>lovely<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> Are the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him who <S%H1319>brings<s%> good <S%H1319>news,<s%> Who <S%H8085>announces<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> And <S%H1319>brings<s%> good <S%H1319>news<s%> of <S%H9185>happiness,<s%> Who <S%H8085>announces<s%> <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> [And] <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> "Your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4427>reigns!<s%>"

<S%H6963>Listen!<s%> Your <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up [their] <S%H6963>voices,<s%> They <S%H7442>shout<s%> <S%H7442>joyfully<s%> <S%H9191>together;<s%> For they will <S%H7200>see<s%> with their <S%H5869>own<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7725>restores<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

<S%H6476>Break<s%> <S%H6476>forth,<s%> <S%H7442>shout<s%> <S%H7442>joyfully<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> You <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> He has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H2834>bared<s%> His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> In the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> That <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H7200>see<s%> The <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H5493>Depart,<s%> <S%H5493>depart,<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out from <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H5060>Touch<s%> <S%H408>nothing<s%> <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> <S%H3318>Go<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her, <S%H1305>purify<s%> yourselves, You who <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

But you will not <S%H3318>go<s%> out in <S%H2649>haste,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will you <S%H1980>go<s%> as <S%H4499>fugitives;<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, And the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [will be] your <S%H622>rear<s%> <S%H622>guard.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> My <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H7919>prosper,<s%> He will be <S%H7311>high<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H1361>exalted.<s%>

<S%H9201>Just<s%> as <S%H7227>many<s%> were <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at you, [My people,] <S%H3651>So<s%> His <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was <S%H4893>marred<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> And His <S%H8389>form<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H3651>Thus<s%> He will <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H4428>Kings<s%> will <S%H7092>shut<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> on <S%H5921>account<s%> of Him; For <S%H834>what<s%> had not been <S%H5608>told<s%> them they will <S%H7200>see,<s%> And <S%H834>what<s%> they had not <S%H8085>heard<s%> they will <S%H995>understand.<s%>
